meanings.definition: A filament in a muscle cell, consisting of actin and myosin proteins, that slides past each other to cause muscle contraction.
meanings.sent1: The myofilaments in the muscle cell work together to make the muscle contract.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study how myofilaments move to understand muscle function better.
meanings.sent3: The myofilaments in the muscle cell had a race to see which could contract faster.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like the myofilaments, constantly moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The myofilaments danced gracefully, creating a beautiful muscle contraction.
